abstract: Sony, maker of the PSP, will make another portable game device, the Vita.
snippet: Sony, maker of the PSP, will make another portable game device, the Vita.
lead_paragraph: Jack Tretton, the president and chief executive of Sony Computer Entertainment America, announced Tuesday that the company's PlayStation Vita mobile gaming device would go on sale in the United States on Feb. 22, 2012.

headline.main: Release Date in U.S. Set for New Sony Mobile Game Console
